data_table.description: Exclusions for Brain MRI and Neuropsychology Measures Baseline and Follow-up (Offspring), measured from April 1999 through November 2011. This dataset contains possible exclusions (prevalent stroke, dementia, other neurological condition) to be used with the following dataset: vr_mrbne7f_2011_1_0487s.

variable.name: np_x7fu_excludeON
variable.description: Exclude for brain injury or disease other than prevalent stroke or dementia at time of follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: np_x7fu_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent dementia at follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: np_x7fu_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent stroke at follow-up Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: mr_x7fu_excludeON
variable.description: Exclude for brain injury or disease other than prevalent stroke or dementia at time of follow-up MRI

variable.name: mr_x7fu_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent dementia at follow-up MRI

variable.name: mr_x7fu_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent stroke at follow-up MRI

variable.name: np_excludeON
variable.description: Exclude for brain injury or disease other than prevalent stroke or dementia at time of initial Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: np_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent dementia at time of initial Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: np_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent stroke at time of initial Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: mri_excludeON
variable.description: Exclude for brain injury or disease other than prevalent stroke or dementia at time of initial MRI

variable.name: mri_ExcludeDEM
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent dementia at time of initial MRI

variable.name: mri_ExcludeSTRK
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent stroke at time of initial MRI

variable.name: mr_x7fu
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since exam 1.

variable.name: np_x7fu
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since exam 1.

variable.name: mri_date
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since exam 1.

variable.name: np_date
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since exam 1.
